panels.description: TiDB query durations by histogram buckets with different percents

panels.description: MySQL commands processing numbers per second. See https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/text-protocol.html and https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/prepared-statements.html

targets.expr: sum(tidb_server_connections{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) * sum(rate(tidb_server_handle_query_duration_seconds_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[1m])) / sum(rate(tidb_server_handle_query_duration_seconds_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[1m]))

panels.description: TiDB process rss memory usage. TiDB heap memory size in use

targets.expr: go_memory_classes_heap_objects_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"} + go_memory_classes_heap_unused_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"} + go_memory_classes_heap_released_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"} + go_memory_classes_heap_free_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"}

go_memory_classes_heap_objects_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"} + go_memory_classes_heap_unused_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"}

go_memory_classes_heap_released_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"} + go_memory_classes_heap_free_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="tidb"}

panels.description:
When the pessimistic transaction begins to work, it will send heartbeat requests to update its TTL. 
This metric is the latency of the send heartbeat operation.

panels.description: The duration of a statement acquiring all pessimistic locks at a time.

panels.description: This metric means the pessimistic lives too long which is abnormal.
panels.title: TTL Lifetime Reach Counter

panels.description: safe point loading times

panels.description: When the pessimistic statement is executed, the lock fails and it can retry automatically. The number of times the statement is retried is recorded.

panels.description: This metric shows the OPS of different types of transactions.

panels.description: How many times transactions enter this state in the last minute
